title: Sual tlen fai nan Isua hnenah i kal em
lyrics:
Sual tlen fai nan Isua hnenah i kal em?
Beramno thisenin i var em?
A khawngaih chakna i ring takzet thin em?
Beramno thisenin i var em?

Beramno thisenin,
Beramno thisenin i var em?
Kaidum nei lo tawpin i puan a fai em?
Beramno thisenin i var em?

Ni tin Chhandamtu kiangah i kal thin em?
Beramno thisenin i var em?
Mi an khenbeh ngei chu i ring fo thin em?
Beramno thisenin i var em?

Moneitu hmuak tlakin i puan i var em?
Beramno thisenin i var em?
Van ina kal tu rin i inpeih tawh em?
Beramno thisenin i var em?

Chhiar sen loh var hnu pawhin a la tling fo,
Beramno thisenin i var em?
Hnam ze tinreng tan a ni, a kang thei lo,
Beramno thisenin i var em?

I puan bawlhhlawh tak takte chu tunah hian,
Beramno thisenin silfai la;
I thlarau bawlhhlawh tan tuikhur hlu a awm,
Beramno thisenin sil fai la.
